description:
F.C. Joyce Elementary is a Kindergarten-8th grade elementary school located in North Highlands, California, in the Twin Rivers Unified School District. At F.C. Joyce, we work extremely hard to meet the needs of all students. Our mission is to have all students make at least one year's worth of academic gains annually, to provide a nurturing environment where ALL are respected and valued, and to foster partnerships with families and the community that support students.

The whole staff considers every student as “our” student. Grade-level teams collaborate and share strategies on a weekly basis and engage in regular professional development. We hold a number of family involvement events each year, including our monthly family Friday read-ins, coffee and conversation with the principal, and Winter Festival.
